thread.title: McQuaid to headline HubCityMusic.com house concert
thread.title_full: McQuaid to headline HubCityMusic.com house concert

author: Staff
title: McQuaid to headline HubCityMusic.com house concert
text:
McQuaid to headline HubCityMusic.com house concert Vocalist will play two 45-minute sets Posted: October 16, 2015 - 12:01am © phil nicholls photography Sarah McQuaid 
Recording artist Sarah McQuaid, a folk and Americana vocalist touring in support of new recording “Walking Into White,” will headline a HubCityMusic.com house concert from 7:15 to 10 p.m. Oct. 23 at Paul Johnson’s home at 3707 94th St. 
McQuaid mentioned that she traditionally plays two 45-minute sets. During her present tour, she is devoting her first set to playing her new album live, track-by-track. Doors open at 6:30 p.m. 
Tickets are $20, with all funds going to the performers. Payment is accepted at the door, or advance payment can be made via credit card, PayPal or checks made out to Paul Johnson and mailed to Johnson’s address. Donations also are accepted, and the event has a BYOB policy for alcohol. Complimentary bottled water and snacks are provided at intermission. 
Seating is limited to 60. Call Johnson at 535-0303 or e-mail pj.1@sbcglobal.net for more information. TAGS:
